PHRASE.LANG: Have a bit of fun with this reptile hair do! Watch him cling to your head, don’t shake him off! [#Legal]
Amusez-vous avec ce reptile perché sur votre tête! Regardez-le s’accrocher à votre tête. Ne la secouez pas trop ! [#Legal]
Viel Spaß mit dieser Reptilien-Frisur! Beobachte, wie er sich an deinen Kopf klammert und schüttel ihn nicht ab! [#Legal]
Buon divertimento con questo rettile che ha dato alla testa, non scuotere troppo o potrebbe cadere! [#Legal]
Diviertase con este reptil que se le ha subido a la cabeza, no la agite mucho o podría caerse! [#Legal]
Have a bit of fun with this reptile hair do! Watch him cling to your head, don’t shake him off! [#Legal]
Have a bit of fun with this reptile hair do! Watch him cling to your head, don’t shake him off! [#Legal]
